subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Devin Hester, a rookie with the Chicago Bears, famous for returning punts, kickoffs, and anything else he can get his gloves on, is the kind of player who could change this year’s Super Bowl with one cutback.
snippet: Devin Hester, a rookie with the Chicago Bears, famous for returning punts, kickoffs, and anything else he can get his gloves on, is the kind of player who could change this year’s Super Bowl with one cutback.
